title: Python Started as a Christmas Holiday Project
shortDescription: Python was created during Christmas holidays in 1989 as a hobby project!
detailedDescription: Guido van Rossum started Python as a hobby project during the Christmas holidays in 1989. He was looking for an interesting project to keep him occupied during the week around Christmas. He wanted to create a scripting language that would be a descendant of ABC and appeal to Unix/C hackers.
